text: My little girl enjoys having her ballet class here! Ballet teacher Ms Jam is approachable and the operation executive Ms Audrey is very friendly and helpful. She responds fast to our enquiries! Will recommend to my friends to join us here for enjoyable dancing journey.
Came for the trial and my daughter really love the class. The teacher was nice and patience. Very happy to see her settle in quickly. Thank you Dancepointe Academy.

Dancepoint has a very friendly and kindly environment and very excellent teacher's here. My daughter was shy when she just came to dance class, she can engage with the kid's very well now. and she always share the story with me for dance times. it really helps to build up her confidence for her. Thank you!

My daughter has been Dancepointe Buangkok for almost 2 years. My daughter enjoys herself very much and the receptionist, Audrey is very helpful. She is always there to assist the teachers and everyone there.

My girl has been with Dancepointe Academy for more than a year now! She looks forward to her ballet lesson every week and we even recommended our friends to bring their children over to try. My girl loves Ms Jam and wants to be a ballerina like her too!
